document.full_text: jpmorgan chase & co  could be forced to repurchase thousands of home equity loans, after a judge ruled in favor of a bond insurer that argued it could build its case based on a sampling of loans.
document.title: jpmorgan loses court ruling over loan putbacks
lines_and_colors: jpmorgan chase & co  could be forced to repurchase thousands of home equity loans, after a judge ruled in favor of a bond insurer that argued it could build its case based on a sampling of loans.
